00040 /* Sched status flags */
00041 #define XNKCOUT         0x80000000      /* Sched callout context */
00042 #define XNINTCK         0x40000000      /* In master tick handler context */
00043 #define XNSWLOCK        0x20000000      /* In context switch */
00044 #define XNRESCHED       0x10000000      /* Needs rescheduling */
00045 
00046 /* Sched local flags */
00047 #define XNHTICK         0x00008000      /* Host tick pending  */
00048 #define XNINIRQ         0x00004000      /* In IRQ handling context */
00049 #define XNHDEFER        0x00002000      /* Host tick deferred */
00050 
00051 struct xnsched_rt {
00052         xnsched_queue_t runnable;       
00053 };

00133         const char *name;

00137 #define XNSCHED_CLASS_WEIGHT(n)         (n * XNSCHED_CLASS_MAX_THREADS)

00142 #ifdef CONFIG_SMP
00143 #define xnsched_cpu(__sched__)  ((__sched__)->cpu)
00144 #else /* !CONFIG_SMP */
00145 #define xnsched_cpu(__sched__)  ({ (void)__sched__; 0; })
00146 #endif /* CONFIG_SMP */
00147 
00148 /* Test resched flag of given sched. */
00149 static inline int xnsched_resched_p(struct xnsched *sched)
00150 {
00151         return testbits(sched->status, XNRESCHED);
00152 }
00153 
00154 /* Set self resched flag for the given scheduler. */
00155 #define xnsched_set_self_resched(__sched__) do {                \
00156   XENO_BUGON(NUCLEUS, __sched__ != xnpod_current_sched());      \
00157   __setbits((__sched__)->status, XNRESCHED);                    \
00158 } while (0)
00159 
00160 /* Set resched flag for the given scheduler. */
00161 #ifdef CONFIG_SMP
00162 #define xnsched_set_resched(__sched__) do {                             \
00163   xnsched_t *current_sched = xnpod_current_sched();                     \
00164   if (current_sched == (__sched__))                                     \
00165       __setbits(current_sched->status, XNRESCHED);                      \
00166   else if (!xnsched_resched_p(__sched__)) {                             \
00167       xnarch_cpu_set(xnsched_cpu(__sched__), current_sched->resched);   \
00168       __setbits((__sched__)->status, XNRESCHED);                        \
00169       __setbits(current_sched->status, XNRESCHED);                      \
00170   }                                                                     \
00171 } while (0)
00172 #else /* !CONFIG_SMP */
00173 #define xnsched_set_resched     xnsched_set_self_resched
00174 #endif /* !CONFIG_SMP */

00181 {
00182         if (sched->zombie)
00183                 __xnsched_finalize_zombie(sched);

00195         return testbits(sched->status, XNRESCHED);

00206         ({ XENO_BUGON(NUCLEUS, !hard_irqs_disabled());  \
00207                 (__sched__); })

00210 #define xnsched_resched_after_unlocked_switch()         do { } while(0)
00211 
00212 #define xnsched_maybe_resched_after_unlocked_switch(sched)      \
00213         ({ (void)(sched); 0; })

00289 static inline void xnsched_rotate(struct xnsched *sched,
00290                                   struct xnsched_class *sched_class,
00291                                   const union xnsched_policy_param *sched_param)
00292 {
00293         sched_class->sched_rotate(sched, sched_param);

00296 static inline int xnsched_init_tcb(struct xnthread *thread)
00297 {
00298         int ret = 0;
00299 
00300         xnsched_idle_init_tcb(thread);
00301         xnsched_rt_init_tcb(thread);
00302 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_SCHED_TP
00303         ret = xnsched_tp_init_tcb(thread);
00304         if (ret)
00305                 return ret;
00306 #endif /* CONFIG_XENO_OPT_SCHED_TP */
00307 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_SCHED_SPORADIC
00308         ret = xnsched_sporadic_init_tcb(thread);
00309         if (ret)
00310                 return ret;
00311 #endif /* CONFIG_XENO_OPT_SCHED_SPORADIC */
00312         return ret;
00313 }

00315 static inline int xnsched_root_priority(struct xnsched *sched)
00316 {
00317         return sched->rootcb.cprio;
00318 }
00319 
00320 static inline struct xnsched_class *xnsched_root_class(struct xnsched *sched)
00321 {
00322         return sched->rootcb.sched_class;
00323 }
00324 
00325 static inline void xnsched_tick(struct xnthread *thread)
00326 {
00327         struct xnsched_class *sched_class = thread->sched_class;
00328         /*
00329          * A thread that undergoes round-robin scheduling only
00330          * consumes its time slice when it runs within its own
00331          * scheduling class, which excludes temporary PIP boosts.
00332          */
00333         if (sched_class != &xnsched_class_idle &&
00334             sched_class == thread->base_class &&
00335             thread->sched->curr == thread &&
00336             xnthread_test_state(thread, XNTHREAD_BLOCK_BITS|XNLOCK|XNRRB) == XNRRB)
00337                 sched_class->sched_tick(thread);
00338 }
00339 
00340 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_SCHED_CLASSES
00341 
00342 static inline void xnsched_enqueue(struct xnthread *thread)
00343 {
00344         struct xnsched_class *sched_class = thread->sched_class;
00345 
00346         if (sched_class != &xnsched_class_idle)
00347                 sched_class->sched_enqueue(thread);
00348 }
00349 
00350 static inline void xnsched_dequeue(struct xnthread *thread)
00351 {
00352         struct xnsched_class *sched_class = thread->sched_class;
00353 
00354         if (sched_class != &xnsched_class_idle)
00355                 sched_class->sched_dequeue(thread);
00356 }
00357 
00358 static inline void xnsched_requeue(struct xnthread *thread)
00359 {
00360         struct xnsched_class *sched_class = thread->sched_class;
00361 
00362         if (sched_class != &xnsched_class_idle)
00363                 sched_class->sched_requeue(thread);
00364 }
00365 
00366 static inline int xnsched_weighted_bprio(struct xnthread *thread)
00367 {
00368         return thread->bprio + thread->sched_class->weight;
00369 }
00370 
00371 static inline int xnsched_weighted_cprio(struct xnthread *thread)
00372 {
00373         return thread->cprio + thread->sched_class->weight;
00374 }

00394 static inline void xnsched_forget(struct xnthread *thread)
00395 {
00396         struct xnsched_class *sched_class = thread->base_class;
00397 
00398         --sched_class->nthreads;
00399 
00400         if (sched_class->sched_forget)
00401                 sched_class->sched_forget(thread);
00402 }
00403 
00404 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_SCHED_CLASSES */
00405 
00406 /*
00407  * If only the RT and IDLE scheduling classes are compiled in, we can
00408  * fully inline common helpers for dealing with those.
00409  */
00410 
00411 static inline void xnsched_enqueue(struct xnthread *thread)
00412 {
00413         struct xnsched_class *sched_class = thread->sched_class;
00414 
00415         if (sched_class != &xnsched_class_idle)
00416                 __xnsched_rt_enqueue(thread);
00417 }
00418 
00419 static inline void xnsched_dequeue(struct xnthread *thread)
00420 {
00421         struct xnsched_class *sched_class = thread->sched_class;
00422 
00423         if (sched_class != &xnsched_class_idle)
00424                 __xnsched_rt_dequeue(thread);
00425 }
00426 
00427 static inline void xnsched_requeue(struct xnthread *thread)
00428 {
00429         struct xnsched_class *sched_class = thread->sched_class;
00430 
00431         if (sched_class != &xnsched_class_idle)
00432                 __xnsched_rt_requeue(thread);
00433 }
00434 
00435 static inline int xnsched_weighted_bprio(struct xnthread *thread)
00436 {
00437         return thread->bprio;
00438 }
00439 
00440 static inline int xnsched_weighted_cprio(struct xnthread *thread)
00441 {
00442         return thread->cprio;
00443 }

00445 static inline void xnsched_setparam(struct xnthread *thread,
00446                                     const union xnsched_policy_param *p)
00447 {
00448         struct xnsched_class *sched_class = thread->sched_class;
00449 
00450         if (sched_class != &xnsched_class_idle)
00451                 __xnsched_rt_setparam(thread, p);
00452         else
00453                 __xnsched_idle_setparam(thread, p);
00454 }
00455 
00456 static inline void xnsched_getparam(struct xnthread *thread,
00457                                     union xnsched_policy_param *p)
00458 {
00459         struct xnsched_class *sched_class = thread->sched_class;
00460 
00461         if (sched_class != &xnsched_class_idle)
00462                 __xnsched_rt_getparam(thread, p);
00463         else
00464                 __xnsched_idle_getparam(thread, p);
00465 }
00466 
00467 static inline void xnsched_trackprio(struct xnthread *thread,
00468                                      const union xnsched_policy_param *p)
00469 {
00470         struct xnsched_class *sched_class = thread->sched_class;
00471 
00472         if (sched_class != &xnsched_class_idle)
00473                 __xnsched_rt_trackprio(thread, p);
00474         else
00475                 __xnsched_idle_trackprio(thread, p);
00476 }
00477 
00478 static inline void xnsched_forget(struct xnthread *thread)
00479 {
00480         --thread->base_class->nthreads;
00481         __xnsched_rt_forget(thread);
00482 }
